decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ff4fa3d9-7fff-a188-5dc5-8e7d40f88f70"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed rear and roof external terraces, by reason of design, location and scale, would give rise to adverse noise and disturbance impacts, to the detriment of the living conditions of adjoining residents. Therefore the proposal is contrary to D14 (Noise) of the London Plan 2021, LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 and the Residential Extension and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-56c4d3ad-7fff-449e-3fc9-b59a4e7eae96"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed rear external terraces and spiral stair arrangement, by reason of inappropriate design and location, would comprise uncharacteristic features that would facilitate adverse overlooking and loss of privacy impacts to adjoining neighbouring properties to the detriment of their living conditions.The proposal is deemed contrary to D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design led approach) of the London Plan 2021, LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 and Residential Extension and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-5aa59b7b-7fff-2bfc-7dbe-df9552e94743"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed development (rear extension and mansard), by reason of inappropriate design, scale and massing, would comprise an unsympathetic and incongruous form of development, failing to preserve or enhance the significance of the host locally listed building, the character and appearance of the terrace and wider Pitfield Street Conservation Area, contrary to policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design led approach), HC1 (Heritage quality and standards) of the London Plan 2021 policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP4 (Non-Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033, the Pitfield Conservation area Appraisal 2021 and the Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009. </span></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-57e288dd-7fff-aeb1-6a96-d2710693f4cc"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed rear extension and associated works, by reason of inappropriate scale, form and location, would give rise to a loss of outlook, daylight and increased sense of enclosure, to the detriment of the living conditions of adjoining 62 Buttesland Street further detracting from the quality of life for neighbouring residents. Therefore, the proposal is deemed contrary to LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033, policy D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design led approach) of the London Plan 2021 and Residential Extension and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><br></p>
description: Erection of a part one part two storey extension at basement level, a ground and first floor terrace and associated alterations to the rear elevation and the erection of a mansard roof extension featuring a front roof terrace
